meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kim Carver Jared Hall David Brown Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6659.

td.p: Kim Carver, an attorney from San Francisco, California
Jared Hall, a graduate student in global policy studies from Austin, Texas
David Brown, a fundraising intern from Palo Alto, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $32,600)

tr.td: THE "BE"GINNING
ACTUAL POLICE BLOTTER REPORTS
FACE TIME
U.S. CITY NICKNAMES
LEFT, RIGHT & CENTER
IT'S NOT MATT LAUER

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [after revealing Kim\'s response] The heir apparent to the French throne is the dauphin, and [*] is right.)
DavidWhat is a seal?
$4,000
KimWhat is a dolphin?
$1,000
JaredWhat is a dolphin
$0
a dolphin')

tr.td: FRENCH HISTORY
Starting in 1349, this marine animal was on the coat of arms of the heir apparent to the French throne
David
Jared
Kim
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $31,200
2nd place: $2,000
David
Jared
Kim

9 R,
3 W

28 R
(including 3 DDs),
1 W
